chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 Pro has the following issue.

Thank you,

When the seller receives the package, they have 3 business days (5 business days for laptops and household appliances) to repair or replace the product, or 2 business days to make a refund if it proceeds.
The customer meets the following requirements to proceed with the return:
✔ Confirms that the device has not been opened by a third party, exposed to water, or suffered an impact or fall
✔ Has confirmed they have the return label.
✔ Understands that accessories and proof of purchase must be included in the return package.
✔ Understands they have 14 days to use the return label.

Remember: once delivered, the seller has 3 business days (5 business days for laptops and household appliances) to repair or replace the article and 2 business days to make a refund if necessary.

Dear Backcare,

We have cancelled the order. Kindly inform the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
AS
